contest-event.event-date:
March 12, 2005 D Silkeblæs
SilkeBlæs 100 Entertainments Contest SilkeBlæs silkebls
This contest is held every other year. Until 2002 it was held in even-numbered years. It was held in 2005 instead of 2004 and has since continued in odd-numbered years. The same happened in 2017/8, with the 2018 contest divided into sections.
Jysk Musik- og teaterhus, Silkeborg, Central Denmark, Denmark Performance: Odense Blæserne Solistprisen: Claus Mærsk, Flygelhorn, Concord Brass Band Nyskabende: Silkeborg Blæserne - Ny musik af Jan Sørensen Publikumsprisen: Silkeborg Blæserne
Nov. 1, 2011, 5 p.m. Nov. 1, 2011, 5:10 p.m.
1 Lyngby-Taarbaek Brass Band Dennis Aaberg Andersen
2 Silkeborg Blaeserne Unknown
3 Concord Brass Band Unknown
4 Odense Brass Unknown
5 Nordvestjysk Brass Band Torben Ebbensgaard
6 Århus Brass Band Jacob Vilhelm Larsen
7 Peder Most Gardens Brass Band Unknown
8 FDF Gladsaxe Brass Band Carl Viggo Jespersen
